name: EnvKey
headline: End-to-end encrypted configuration and secrets management
description:
EnvKey is a developer-friendly, cross-platform, end-to-end encrypted configuration and secrets manager. It can be used to store API keys, database credentials, and other application config securely. 

EnvKey makes it easy to grant least-privilege access to the developers and servers that need it from a user-friendly UI. Integration takes minutes.

Using EnvKey ensures that no 3rd party, including EnvKey itself, ever has access to your secrets. 

It takes a part of your system that used to be error-prone and insecure and makes it just work.

raw_markdown='Please note that as of August 1st, 2024, EnvKey Cloud is beginning a six month wind down. It will shut down on February 1st, 2025. New registrations are now disabled for EnvKey Cloud.[Learn more.](https://envkey.com/<https:/mailchi.mp/f2ee890e5e81/envkey-wind-down>)
[](https://envkey.com/</>)

#  **The simple, secure, open source configuration and secrets manager.**
Protect API keys, credentials, and other secrets with end-to-end encryption. 
Organize, de-duplicate, and sync config wherever it's needed. 
[ ![](https://envkey.com/images/download-blue-b9f409e9.svg) Download ](https://envkey.com/<https:/github.com/envkey/envkey/releases?q=desktop&expanded=true>)
[ View Pricing ](https://envkey.com/</pricing>)
![](https://envkey.com/images/ui-screenshot@2x-a0f8c07c.png) ![](https://envkey.com/images/ui-screenshot-97fea673.png) ![](https://envkey.com/images/cli-867b22e2.gif)
####  Thousands of engineers rely on EnvKey. 
![Zillow](https://envkey.com/images/customer-zillow-9260bd75.png) ![Sky News](https://envkey.com/images/customer-sky-news-893a5d61.png) ![Ginger](https://envkey.com/images/customer-ginger-73999ec1.png) ![Athletic Greens](https://envkey.com/images/customer-athletic-greens-3eaf8dd0.png) ![Lingoda](https://envkey.com/images/customer-lingoda-c3463bd8.png) ![The Daily Beast](https://envkey.com/images/customer-daily-beast-8d0341a1.png) ![Ranker](https://envkey.com/images/customer-ranker-29d11931.png) ![Qogita](https://envkey.com/images/customer-qogita-e629c099.png) ![DNSimple](https://envkey.com/images/customer-dnsimple-f9e0a8eb.png) ![Leif](https://envkey.com/images/customer-leif-1b83b60d.png)
**_‚ò†Ô∏è_ Prevent security incidents.** Keep secrets away from code, email, chat, and browsers. 
**_üõ≥_ Ship faster.** Prevent config bugs and keep environments in sync. 
**_üêé_ Tame your config.** Prevent duplication and sprawl. Control access. Log everything. 
**_üõ†_ Integrate anywhere.** Works with every language, platform, and host. 
####  Integrate easily and securely with any language. 
##### **Node.js**
```

$ npm install envkey --save
import 'envkey'
// That's it. process.env contains the latest config.
var stripe = require('stripe')(process.env.STRIPE_SECRET_KEY)
  
```

##### **Python**
```

$ pip install envkey
import envkey
# That's it. os.environ contains the latest config.
stripe.api_key = os.environ['STRIPE_SECRET_KEY']
   
```

##### **Ruby On Rails**
```

gem 'envkey'
$ bundle install
# That's it. ENV contains the latest config.
Stripe.api_key = ENV['STRIPE_SECRET_KEY']

```

##### **Go**
```

$ go get github.com/envkey/envkeygo
import _ "github.com/envkey/envkeygo"
// That's it. Access the latest config with os.Getenv
stripe.Key = os.Getenv("STRIPE_SECRET_KEY")
  
```

##### **PHP**
```

$ composer require envkey/envkey-php 
require_once 'vendor/autoload.php'; // Include the Composer autoloader
// That's it. Access the latest config with getenv
$stripe = new \Stripe\StripeClient(getenv('STRIPE_SECRET_KEY'));
  
```

##### **Any language** with envkey-source
```

$ envkey-source -- any-shell-command$ envkey-source -- command
# That's it!# That's it! Your command runs with the latest environment variables.


$ envkey-source -w -- ./start-server
# Automatically reload.# Automatically reload with the latest environment after a change.
$ envkey-source -w --rolling -- ./start-server
# No-downtime rolling reloads.# Avoid downtime with rolling reloads across all connected processes.
$ es -- ping '$DATABASE_URL'
# Use the `es` alias to type less.
# Reference vars in commands.# Reference EnvKey variables in your commands.
$ es -r ./reload-env -- ./start-server 
# Custom reload logic.# Run custom reload logic after a change.
$ eval "$(es)"
# Set vars in current shell.# Set your EnvKey variables in the current shell.
$ echo $'\n\neval "$(es --hook bash)"\n' >> ~/.bash_profile
# Auto-load in any directory.# Auto-load the latest environment when entering a directory.
# Works just like direnv.
$ es --dot-env > .env
$ es --json > .env.json
$ es --yaml > .env.yaml
$ es --pam > /etc/environment
# Easy export to many formats.




 More ways to use envkey-source ÀØ


```

[ Integration Quickstart ](https://envkey.com/<https:/docs-v2.envkey.com/docs/integration-quickstart>)
####  EnvKey for ![](https://envkey.com/images/vscode-logo-539b3a78.png) **VS Code** Autocomplete and type checking for environment variables in your _IDE._
![envkey-vscode in action](https://envkey.com/images/envkey-vscode-quick-b497b791.gif)
Works with **46 languages** and counting. 
[ Learn More ‚Üí ](https://envkey.com/</integrations/vscode>)
[ Get The Extension ‚Üí ](https://envkey.com/<https:/marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=EnvKey.envkey-vscode>)
![](https://envkey.com/images/icon-security-server-afcc79ec.svg)
####  Uncompromising security. 
**Zero-knowledge end-to-end encryption** with out-of-band verification ensures that no host, server, employee, or third party (including EnvKey) ever has access to your organization's secrets, unless it is specifically granted. 
EnvKey **protects secrets** from insider threats, ex-employees, data breaches, browser extensions, third party services, and server compromise. 
[ Security Overview ](https://envkey.com/<https:/docs-v2.envkey.com/docs/security>)
![](https://envkey.com/images/icon-security-redundancy-56052516.svg)
####  Reliable and redundant. 
For EnvKey Cloud and Business Self-Hosted, redundancy across availability zones and regions allows us to guarantee **> 99.99% uptime** for loading secrets and config. 
EnvKey has **eliminated a class of problem** which absolutely plagued us, especially on new fast-moving projects, where you can't afford to lose half a day debugging some cryptic error message because there just happens to be a random new env var. 
Gabriel Fortuna Founder, Zero One
EnvKey has been **such a lifesaver** for our team at Soundstripe. Onboarding new developers was instantly streamlined as far as environment setups are concerned, and configuring servers has been simplified dramatically. We're hooked! 
Trevor Hinesley CTO, Soundstripe
First of all, I would like to say THANK YOU. EnvKey has **solved a major problem for us** , in managing our secrets really well. We rolled it out across our dev, staging and production environments yesterday, and it was a smooth, 15 minute process. 
Devan Sabaratnam Founder, HRPartner
##  Multi-layered **security.**
Audit logs 
Artboard 23 Easy access control 
Trusted IPs 
##  Enhanced **productivity.**
Version control 
Powerful, scriptable CLI 
Environment branches 
noun_boxes_3254207 Created with Sketch. Stackable config blocks 
Custom environments 
Environment inheritance 
007 - Laptop Local development overrides 
Conflict resolution 
Change hooks 
##  Flexible _hosting._
Turn-key self-hosting 
Multi-region redundancy 
Behind-your-firewall mode 
##  Advanced _user management._
Teams 
SAML SSO 
SCIM directory sync 
####  See it in action. 
Watch Dane integrate EnvKey with an app in just a few minutes. 
####  Integrate in minutes. Make security the path of least resistance.

generated_description:
### EnvKey: Your Secure Secrets Management Solution

**Introduction**
EnvKey is a San Francisco-based startup, proudly part of Y Combinator's Batch W18, focused on end-to-end encrypted secrets and configuration management. With a minimal team of just two employees, EnvKey offers a developer-friendly approach to managing sensitive information like API keys and database credentials safely.

**Mission and Features**
The core mission of EnvKey is simple yet crucial in today's tech landscape: to provide secure, encrypted management of configuration and secrets while ensuring no third party, including EnvKey itself, has access to your sensitive data. The tool is designed to make it easy to grant limited access to developers and servers through a user-friendly interface, which ensures integration takes mere minutes.

With EnvKey, you can:
- **Prevent security incidents**: Keep secrets away from code, email, and chat applications.
- **Ship faster**: Avoid configuration bugs and maintain environment consistency.
- **Tame configuration**: Prevent sprawl and duplication while controlling access and logging everything.
- **Integrate anywhere**: Compatible with multiple programming languages and platforms, EnvKey works seamlessly with your existing workflows.

**Security First**
EnvKey employs a zero-knowledge, end-to-end encryption model with out-of-band verification to protect secrets from any unauthorized access, including insiders, ex-employees, and data breaches. This robust security model gives teams peace of mind while boosting productivity through streamlined configuration management.

**Current Updates**
As of August 1st, 2024, EnvKey is winding down its cloud service, which will officially shut down on February 1st, 2025. However, the company continues to provide resources and documentation for its users to transition smoothly. You can still visit their website [here](https://envkey.com) to learn more about features, pricing, and how to integrate with various programming languages.

**User Experience and Testimonials**
Thousands of engineers rely on EnvKey to simplify their secrets management. Customers have praised EnvKey for:
- Seamless onboarding for new developers.
- Vast productivity improvements in environment setups.
- Overall efficiency in managing secrets across development, staging, and production.

**Closing Thoughts**
In a world where security breaches are becoming increasingly frequent, EnvKey stands out as a reliable solution for secrets management. Its developer-centric design allows teams to focus on building great products without getting bogged down by security concerns. If you're looking for a way to effortlessly manage your application's sensitive information, EnvKey is definitely worth considering.
